resources.string:
Hello! My name is Gal. 

I love to scuba dive. 

Going to deep depths and seeing the wonderful creatures beneath the surface is an amazing sight. 

My father usually accompanies me on my trips. 

The last time I went I saw dolphins for the first time. 

I was in awe. 

I plan my next adventure to take place with sharks. 

I am looking forward to endless endeavors. 


 I copied and pasted so that it could scroll down
